name: Northern Dynasty Minerals Ltd.
longDescription: Northern Dynasty Minerals Ltd is a Canadian mineral exploration company. It has a single operating segment of acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties. Its core asset is the Pebble Project located in Alaska, USA. The Pebble project is seeking to develop a significant deposit of copper, gold, molybdenum, and silver into a modern mining operation.

fullAddress: 1040 West Georgia Street,14th Floor, Vancouver, BC, CA
